Title: Requires mercantile establishments to cease collections under certain circumstances
Summary: Requires mercantile establishments to cease collections upon a court finding of not guilty of larceny in mercantile establishments.
LawCode: Amd ยง11-105, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general obligations law, in relation to requiring mercantile establishments to cease collections upon a court finding of not guilty of larceny in mercantile establishments
